name: Ocultas
description:
Hide yourself among your fellow skeletons
and convert the other players while remaining stealthy is your objective. In a world where death is permanent,
make sure to bribe other players under your banner in order to remain the last skeleton.

But beware, don't spend your time hiding in the corner!
Players who get closer to the skeleton dog gain points and can win before you find them.
Hide'n'seek :
Hide in the crowd, behave like an AI to remain stealthy Conquer : 
Find and punch your opponents to rally them and their AI to your banner Cooperate : 
Chase the other players with your previous opponents to be the last team on the field Be strategic : 
Play for victory points by staying close to the skeleton dog or use it to unmask your enemies

This is a local multiplayer party game playable from 2 to 4 players. Don't forget the external controller to play with your friends remotely ! (e.g. Parsec) GAME PROGRAMMERS
